title: My Little Monster, Vol. 1
description: OPPOSITES ATTRACT... MAYBE?Haru Yoshida is feared as an unstable and violent "monster." Shizuku Mizutani is a grade-obsessed student with no friends. Fate brings these two together to form the most unlikely pair. Haru firmly believes he's in love with Shizuku and she firmly believes he's insane.
author: Robico
